title: help...
body: ever since the mecha zero Sion patch on the 15th of April (my birthday) my league has been saying error 1, and ill try reinstalling it and all it says is "another version of this product is already installed" i have deleted everything league related and i cant give up on the game as i have spent so much on it. please help riot {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Hey DigitX2,

It seems like there may have been an issue with the installation/uninstallation process. Please go through the following Riot Games Support article and let me know if that resolves your issue:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends

Oh, and HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

tysm man, i got it working

<3

> [{quoted}](name=DigitX2,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=oXULrAv4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-16T08:27:46.746+0000)
>
> tysm man, i got it working

> <3

Fantastic! Great to hear, and thanks for following up!
